backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all main frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing required assets and steps for building and deploying the Valentine SPA on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and core UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component managing content state, asset smoke-checks, publish-block logic, and rendering all Valentine sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Deploy: Overlay UI showing detailed asset load failures when the production health check does not pass.
frontend/src/components/valentine/EditPa: Side-sheet editor allowing modification of all Valentine content with normalized caption arrays and safe image upload handling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Footer: Footer displaying the sender name, closing message, and a tracked attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Renders the hero section with decorative hearts, headline text, and a button that triggers scrolling to the letter section.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Displays a styled love letter card with recipient, body text, and sender, using a forwarded ref for scrolling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memori: Shows a 6-tile photo gallery with captions, fallback images, and a lightbox for viewing selected photos.
Wraps the memories gallery with section styling and a header describing shared moments.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memory: Provides a modal lightbox to display a selected memory image with an optional caption and close button.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Publis: Displays an error screen explaining that publishing was blocked and provides guidance and a help link.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Renders a grid of cards listing reasons for love, each decorated with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Defines the overall page layout with a textured background, gradient overlay, and wrapped content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identities.
A hook that syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemoryImages.ts: Manages memory gallery image state with defaults, localStorage persistence, migration, and image replacement/reset functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark Valentine-themed CSS variables plus custom polaroid frame and shadow utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/assetSmokeCheck.ts: Provides a smokeâ€‘test utility to preload critical image assets and report failures by asset and group.
frontend/src/valentine/contentDefaults.t: Exports default ValentineContent values including names, headline, letter text, reasons, and empty memory captions.
frontend/src/valentine/types.ts: Defines the ValentineContent interface describing personalization fields for the Valentine page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors mapped to CSS vars, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, known issues, and deployment notes for the Valentine website build.
